ygData.subject: PK bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have a friend from my old UO days, met him in the early times when I was always alone in Hythloth, a bard wearing no armor (because of 15 strength of
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Dudley Stewart <dud@...>

>an attitude, and I'm seriously considering making a Bard on the PVP server.
>I don't think there's many there... at least I'd not die too much, because
>I'd flee like speedy gonzalez if I was losing the fight, but it'd also be
>interesting to see how Bards stack up against the folks in there.
>


I have a friend from my old UO days, met him in the early times when I was
always alone in Hythloth, a bard wearing no armor (because of 15 strength of
course, screwy game made bards weaklings), but slaying countless daemons.
This fellow became like the apprentice bard, and would watch and assist me.
Later he joined up with a guild of murderers there, and now plays on PvP
here, and is a very high level bard!

He told me that in PvP, the bard quite simply rules, and he wouldn't play
another character.

Roop

Funny story by the way, heheh
